sentences.sContent: ...an electoral process based on the central precept that all people are born equal.
sentences.sCn: …以所有人生而平等这一核心准则为基础的一种选举程序。

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + cept(拿住) → 预先接受的话 → 格言

trans.tranCn: 箴言， 格言； 规则
trans.tranOther: A precept is a general rule that helps you to decide how you should behave in particular circumstances
